means: 高处，高地，高度，海拔，（枪炮的）仰角，射角

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"高度"之意。
means: altitude ：指海拔高度，也指离开地面的高度。
height ：普通用词，指任何物体可测量到的高度，不管物体本身的高低如何。
elevation ：主要指山丘或耸立在地面上物体的海拔高度。

sentence.Network_en: After his elevation to the papacy, he reigned for two years.
sentence.Network_cn: 他升任教皇后在位两年。

sentence.Network_en: We're probably at an elevation of about 13,000 feet above sea level.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们可能在大约海拔13,000英尺的高度。

sentence.Network_en: His elevation to sainthood is entirely justified.
sentence.Network_cn: 他荣升为圣徒是有充分理由的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 第五是抬高（Elevation），受了伤之后，下肢、上肢、膝关节要放在心脏以上的水平，这样可以减少肿胀的发生，促进静脉的回流。 …

词根联想记忆法词汇教程|联想记忆法背单词... ... elevate v. 提高（思想）；抬高 elevation n. 高度，海拔，提高 elicit v. 得出，引出.

list.abs: ...拿手的技能：的，睡觉（觉jiao主），幻想等等。, 不擅长的东西：体育，辣的食物，碳酸饮料（打嗝...），扫地，憋气，绘画以及分辨事物（电梯（elevator）和自动扶梯（escalator）的区别）, 生平：出生于，小学就读于，初中似乎就读于，后转至的高中并出演《》，之后考上大学？！.

英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... legible 不能读的） elevate v 举起，升高(e出＋ liberal 慷慨的→不慷慨的).

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin elevatio(n-), from elevare 'raise' (see elevate)

encyclopedia.content: 所属专集名称：All That You Can't Leave Behind 专辑歌手：U2 发行时间：2000-1-1 发行公司：Interscope Records 所属语言：英语 All That You Can't Leave Behind曲目锛埜枨斜盹級 01 Beautiful Day 02 Elevation 03 Walk On 04 Stuck In A Moment 05 Peace On Earth 盒 06 07 New York 08 In A Little While 09 Wild Honey 10 When I Look At The World 11 Grace Elevation,著名游戏改编的电影《古墓丽影》的主题曲 Elevation

entry.def: In architecture, an elevation is the front, back, or side of a building, or a drawing of one of these.

example.ex: ...the addition of two-storey wings on the north and south elevations.
example.tran: 在南北向的立视图上各增加两层配楼

entry.def: The elevation of a place is its height above sea level.

example.ex: We're probably at an elevation of about 13,000 feet above sea level.
example.tran: 我们可能在大约海拔13,000英尺的高度。

entry.def: An elevation is a piece of ground that is higher than the area around it.

means.word_mean: 1. the event of something being raised upward;

sentences.sentence: "an elevation of the temperature in the afternoon"
"a raising of the land resulting from volcanic activity"

means.word_mean: 2. the highest level or degree attainable;

sentences.sentence: "his landscapes were deemed the acme of beauty"
"the artist's gifts are at their acme"
"...catapulted Einstein to the pinnacle of fame"
"so many highest superlatives achieved by man"

means.word_mean: 3. angular distance above the horizon (especially of a celestial object)
4. a raised or elevated geological formation
5. distance of something above a reference point (such as sea level);

sentences.sentence: "there was snow at the higher elevations"

means.word_mean: 6. (ballet) the height of a dancer's leap or jump;
7. drawing of an exterior of a structure
8. the act of increasing the wealth or prestige or power or scope of something;

auth_sentence.content: So, apologies to them for my sudden elevation.
auth_sentence.res_content: So, apologies to them for my sudden elevation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So, apologies to them for my sudden elevation.

auth_sentence.content: This is mostly a plateau of moderate to high elevation.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is mostly a plateau of moderate to high elevation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is mostly a plateau of moderate to high elevation.

auth_sentence.content: Her elevation seems to exasperate, Dati tells me.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her elevation seems to exasperate, Dati tells me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her elevation seems to exasperate, Dati tells me.

stems_affixes.word_buile: accommodate向…提供住处+ion动作或状态等→accommodation住处,膳宿
communicate交流;通讯+ion动作或状态等→communication传达,信息
congratulate祝贺,庆贺+ion动作或状态等→congratulation祝词,贺辞
consolidate巩固,加强+ion动作或状态等→consolidation巩固,合并
correlate使相互关联+ion动作或状态等→correlation相互关系,相关[性]
dictate口述,口授+ion动作或状态等→dictation
elevate举起,提拔+ion动作或状态等→elevation上升,提高
eliminate除去;淘汰;排[删,消]除+ion动作或状态等→elimination排除,除去,消除,消灭

stems_affixes.value_cn: 用公式表示,明确地表达,作简洁陈述
stems_affixes.word_buile: formulate用公式表示;系统地阐述+ion动作或状态等→formulation用公式表示,明确地表达,作简洁陈述
imitate模仿+ion动作或状态等→imitation模仿,效法
introduce引入,介绍+tion动作或状态等→introduction介绍
irrigate灌溉+ion动作或状态等→irrigation灌溉
reduce减少,缩小+tion动作或状态等→reduction减少

stems_affixes.value_cn: 关系,联系,叙述,故事,亲戚
stems_affixes.word_buile: relate叙述,讲,使联系,发生关系+ion动作或状态等→relation关系,联系,叙述
reproduce生殖;再现;繁殖+tion动作或状态等→n.繁殖,再现,复制品
requisite需要的+ion动作或状态等→requisition征用,要求

stems_affixes.value_cn: 翻译,译文,转化,调任,转换[物][数]平移
stems_affixes.word_buile: translate翻译,解释;转化+ion动作或状态等→translation翻译,译文,转化

sentences.en: The house is at an elevation of 2, 000 metres.
sentences.cn: 那幢房子位于海拔两千米的高处。
